thread.title: How Washington Nationals' Bryce Harper is avoiding watching Mets
thread.title_full: How Washington Nationals' Bryce Harper is avoiding watching Mets | NJ.com

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: How Washington Nationals' Bryce Harper is avoiding watching Mets
text:
How is Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper avoiding watching the Mets face the Chicago Cubs in the NLCS ?
That's a Mickey Mouse question, bro .
PLUS: Jonathan Papelbon chokes Bryce Harper: 7 shots from the brawl
Harper visited Disneyland along with his former fiancee Kayla Varner. Both posted photos from the Magic Kingdom on Sunday:
Haven't done this since I was 8 or so..Disneyland was an epic success today! Still a little kid at heart #ToonTown
A photo posted by Bryce Harper (@bharper3407) on Oct 17, 2015 at 8:58pm PDT
Just here for dole whip and the toy story high score üççüéÆ #HBDB
A photo posted by Kayla Varner (@kayyvarner) on Oct 17, 2015 at 7:59pm PDT
Hey, you'd go to Disneyland too to get away after the way Harper's season ended .
